DOC.brief_summary: Prospective cohort study determine prevalence vertebral fracture HIV infect patient old 50 year .
DOC.brief_title: Prevalence Vertebral Fractures HIV Infected Patients Older Than 50 Years
DOC.detailed_description: To determine prevalence asymptomatic vertebral fracture HIV patient older 50 year , risk fracture follow 2 year , accord bone mineral density inclusion , level serum bone biomarkers , presence secondary factor hypovitaminosis D or/and secondary hyperparathyroidism .
DOC.criteria: Age 50 year HIV infection Pregnancy Receiving corticosteroid antiresorptive therapy
